input_data.prompt_to_llm:
The following financial transaction passed all fraud checks and no unusual patterns were detected. Please generate a concise (2-3 sentences) and reassuring narrative explaining this. Do not include a conversational opening or closing. Focus on clarity and professionalism.

Transaction details: ID 47c74f26-c5be-41bf-9153-618677d1df50, Amount $150.00, Card Type credit, User Location USA, Merchant Amazon, Merchant Location USA.

description: Transaction ID 47c74f26-c5be-41bf-9153-618677d1df50 has been deemed legitimate, with no anomalies detected during fraud screening. The transaction amount of $150.00 was processed through a reputable payment card, issued in the USA, and originated from the same country. All checks indicate a normal and expected payment activity, with no suspicious activity or red flags raised.
